title: Rogue
content:
ey have proficiency with Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords and with Light Armour. The Rogue class is great for taking out unaware or distracted targets with Sneak Attacks, as well as picking locks and disarming traps.

With stealth, skill and uncanny reflexes, a rogue's versatility let's them get the upper hand in almost any situation.

BG3 Rogue Class Features
